<div style="width=80%;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;">
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset provides historical metrics on the global behavior of surface water measured over the full extent of the GSW dataset. The original data, provided at a 30-m resolution, was aggregagted to 300-m and depicts per-pixel percentages.
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Subdatasets</h3>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`maxExtent` | Maximum extent of surface water (%)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...100|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`permanentWater` | Maximum extent of permanent water (%)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...100|
</details>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`seasonalFrequency` | Maximum extent of seasonal water (%)</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...100|
</details>
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">masDMT query</h3>
<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("GSW_history")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("GSW_history/maxExtent")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("GSW_history/maxExtent/300m")
```
</div>
